nodes.text: Krishels were a species of hardshelled, burrowing quadruped found on the volcanic planet Mustafar. They were hunted by the sentient Mustafarians native to the world, who tracked them through seemingly endless subterranean labyrinths of tunnels and caverns.
Krishels were first mentioned in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Special Modifications, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games.
